content: Hi Bitcointalk,We are happy to announce that MegaPari has been shortlisted for the prestigious iGaming award –  EGR Nordics Awards 2023The EGR Nordics Awards celebrate the most successful and innovative online gaming companies operating in the Nordics region. Whether it is commercial success, game-changing innovation, leading customer service or marketing prowess, these awards recognize the operators and service providers that have stood out over the past 12 months in an extremely competitive market.This year, the online casino and sportsbook brand MegaPari is being nominated for the Rising Star award, which recognizes a company of up to three years in existence that, despite being new to the sector, is rapidly growing and establishing itself as a force to be reckoned with.We invite you to celebrate with us and offer a promocode designed specially for the community:Apply a promocode BITCOINTALK and get extra 30% to your welcome bonus package.
